name: Bemuzed
description:
Bemused is a game about a young guy who is at the crossroads between childish naivety and the depressive reality, surrounding him. Everybody knows, that our world is quit a dangerous place. Every friend may appear a foe, and a quiet street can cause you troubles.
Vigilance and a sober view will help you to avoid troubles and dangerous encounters.
But don’t stress too much! Depression can kill you.
Will you be able to find a balance and not to drown in the routine and meaninglessness of existence?

---------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:
Mouse- View
WASD- Movements
SPACE- Jump
SHIFT- Haste
TAB- Tasks description
Z- Toggle real/cloud nine mode
Press key when it needed

---------------------------------------------------------------

Attention! The game has couple of bugs, but is playable and can be bitten. We recommend to restart your game in case if you die. Restart button on the “statistics” screen can cause a bug (Sometimes “Tasks description” interface stuck on a screen). We are sorry for such inconvenience.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Content created before the jam:
MIXAMO character animations: Agonizing, Backward death, breathing idle, falling, falling impact, lating shaking head, laying sleeping, looking around, running, sad idle, sit up to idle, sweep fall, walking
Character Creator 3 texture materials: white and black skin materials, teeth and eye materials
All posters in the starting room were made before jam
All billboard images All fonts
Images: Letter background, Press Button, All noises (Soundly)
Soundtracks: Game Over Screen track, Reality track and Cloud nine track Model of umbrella near the Café
